import requests from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import json
response = requests.get(outputs['target_url']) soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser')
data = [] for header in soup.find_all(['h1', 'h2', 'h3']): data.append({ 'tag': header.name, 'text': header.text.strip() })
with open('scraped_data.json', 'w') as f: json.dump(data, f, indent=2)
print(f"Saved {len(data)} items")
